mapper.sql: ID, ENTERPRISE_ID, TYPE, NAME, FACTORY, MODEL, IDNUM, STATUS, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, AREA, ADDR, USER_NAME, PASSWD, PID, MEMBER_ID, INSTALL_TIME, INSTALL_ADDR, EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, PROJECT_ID, INVALID_TIME
mapper.select: select a.*,b.phone,b.name member_name from alarm_device a,member b where a.MEMBER_ID=b.id
mapper.insert: insert into alarm_device (ID, ENTERPRISE_ID, TYPE, NAME, FACTORY, MODEL, IDNUM, STATUS, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, AREA, ADDR, USER_NAME, PASSWD, PID, MEMBER_ID, INSTALL_TIME, INSTALL_ADDR, EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, PROJECT_ID, INVALID_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{installAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invalidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update alarm_device
ENTERPRISE_ID = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY = #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDNUM = #{idnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSTALL_TIME = #{installTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INSTALL_ADDR = #{installAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVALID_TIME = #{invalidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update alarm_device set ENTERPRISE_ID = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACTORY = #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{idnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDR = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSTALL_TIME = #{installTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INSTALL_ADDR = #{installAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVALID_TIME = #{invalidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
